posts.title: Why Vue is Awesome
posts.text: It's easy to use, fast, and has lots of great tooling.  Plus, lots of companies will pay you to write it!

posts.title: Best VueJS Tips
posts.text: 1. Use a text editor 2. It's important that your computer be turned on. 3. Serious one, ask in the Slack channel if you have any questions.

posts.title: What your favorite Javascript framework says about you...
posts.text: Angular: You are a programmer.  React: You are a programmer.  Vue: You are a programmer, and awesome.
